channel.title: Smart-Phone Theme Complaint
channel.description:
It's fucking annoying. It takes away lots of features and it's a pain in the ass switching back to the classic normal view of it. You can't edit your profile or anything, there isn't the "Show new replies to your posts" option or the "Show unread posts since last visit" option. I haven't made any posts while using that theme but I can just imagine it's the exact same thing as it would be in the normal theme. I use an iTouch by the way, not a phone. Here's my main problem. When I finally do switch back to normal theme and I don't touch it for a while, it switches back to the smart-phone theme. If I try to switch to the normal theme, it sometimes tells me "Too many redirects occuring" or some shit like that. It takes me a while to finally switch into the normal theme. At least with YouTube and Facebook and Myspace you can click the "View classic mode" option and it'll stay in that mode. If it permanently stayed in the normal theme after you tell it to and it didn't switch back to smart-phone after like 15 minutes of inactivity on it, then I'd be fine with it. Otherwise, the whole theme is just redundant and inconvienient.
Discuss?

item.title: Smart-Phone Theme Complaint
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:16, topic:328275”]I have never had a problem clicking the ‘classic’ button, I have an android phone though. As to the ‘functionality’ you are missing, it is supposed to be missing, I’ve never seen a mobile site that has all the functionality of the full site. If you need to do things like edit your profile, then just switch back to the regular theme, it’s easy. The setting lasts as long as your cookie lasts.

You can force yourself to use the smart-phone theme by going to:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


And force yourself back by clicking classic, or visiting:
moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Just bookmark that last link if you never want to use the smart-phone theme again.[/quote]

Well I actually did try that, and it kept giving me a webpage error that said something like “Cannot complete request too many requests occuring” or something similar to that. I can’t remember right now. I’m on a computer right now. To get it to switch to the classic theme, I have to go to the bottom and click on that “home” button then click the “classic” button at the top left-hand corner and it switches back. Then like I can leave the website and go back to it right away and use that last bookmarked link like you suggested and it will work, but then after I’m inactive on it for 15 minutes or so, it gives me that too many redirects error again. That’s what my problem is, but whatever. I guess it’s not that big of a deal. The problem might only be occuring on the iTouch. I appreciate the fact how you didn’t slam me like the others, so thanks for that. That’s my only complaint about it really. I can handle my other complaints, but nonetheless, it was a great theme. So good work on it.

[quote=“Kihomura, post:17, topic:328275”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=424666.msg3119029#msg3119029 date=1265337162]
Are you retarded? It fucking switches back.[/quote]

Are you? It doesn’t switch back, I’ve checked multiple times.[/quote]

Well I just found out it doesn’t physically switch back, I just thought it did. The only way I can get the site to work again is if I use the link to make it the smart-phone theme, so it kind of forces me back into the smart-phone theme on my own. Whatever. I hate fighting on these forums because it’s a waste of time and just not worth it. Let’s just end our problem now and forget about it.

Read full topic

If you need to do things like edit your profile, then just switch back to the regular theme, it’s easy. The setting lasts as long as your cookie lasts.

item.title: Smart-Phone Theme Complaint
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:10, topic:328275”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=424666.msg3118992#msg3118992 date=1265333652]
Just something very simple like a switch in a mobile theme to a classic theme to make it permanently stay.
[/quote]
Then you obviously fucking suck, because it works perfectly. If you’re in the mobile theme, click “Classic mode” or whatever the hell the button says, then go to your profile and change the settings. Was that so hard?[/quote]

Are you retarded? It fucking switches back. I said that twice. Once I go on the forums on my iTouch, it automatically puts me back into the mobile theme. I can have my opinion on it, but I’m not fucking saying to remove it. I’m saying make it fucking stay in classic mode permanently when I tell it to go into classic mode instead of reverting back to mobile theme after a couple minutes of inactivity on the forums. God dammit. How the fuck else can I explain it because you obviously don’t get it.

Lin:

Leave faggot. No one wants you here. Go cry about someone trying to help elsewhere.

Fuck off, buddy.

Read full topic

item.title: Smart-Phone Theme Complaint
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:6, topic:328275”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=424666.msg3118877#msg3118877 date=1265322035]
That was a stupid ignorant post.
[/quote]
you’re still the cool kid whipping out MoparScape on his iTouch in public.[/quote]

I’m grounded from the computer and I like to get on once in a while. If I actually had access to a computer, then why the hell do you think I’d choose my iTouch over that? “Use a computer”. Well no shit. We aren’t talking about a computer though. We’re talking about the smart-phone theme and an iTouch, so that post was so far-fetched. I’m pretty sure watching tv in my family room isn’t out in public. Where did I even say I wanted it out in public? Think before posting.

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:5, topic:328275”]I’d like to point out the fact that you’re expectations of moparscape are that of Myspace, Youtube, and Facebook… That’s ridiculous. By switching to the smart phone theme, you’ve done it completely under your own intentions. This isn’t criticism at all, it’s just bashing something that mitb made for us to our convenience. Of course he doesn’t have a team programming to your liking, he’s done this in his free time. Give him a break.

Edit: Also, phone themes are supposed to be simplified, hence the reason there isn’t any of those additional features.[/quote]

I’m not bashing him. I never said to get rid of it. I said it’d be better if it was made so it would permanently stay on classic view. And I’m not switching to the smart-phone theme, I don’t know where you got the idea that I was trying to. I’m not comparing MoparScape to the whole overview of Facebook or Myspace. Just something very simple like a switch in a mobile theme to a classic theme to make it permanently stay.

Read full topic
